data.title: Added destructible trees to the C&C: TD/RA campaigns
data.body: Brings back https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/2612, but for the single-player missions only as I don't want to disturb balancing.

data.title: Added TransformsNearResources for Tiberium Tree creation
data.body: Implements https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/9524#issuecomment-262881258 and closes #14051. I added this to the campaign rules as those maps were designed for it, while all the OpenRA multiplayer maps certainly weren't as we are introducing this just now. I just want to add this detail, not derail all balancing.

data.title: Plugs are not drawn in the map editor
data.body: The shellmap is a good example.

data.title: Waypoint loops and orbiting guards
data.body:
- infinite waypoint-loops would make sense to set up proper guard-routes (once #13709 is implemented) a good use case - example would be dogs circling a base to detect spies

- we could make the "guard" mode more interesting by letting the guards "auto-orbit" the actually target that needs to be protected (with short breaks inbetween) ,  instead of just following when it moves... (like a bodyguard is shielding a target) 
that way guarding "buildings" would also make sense and should get implemented

data.title: Remove hardcoded hotkey references from production, support powers, and viewport.
data.body:
Part 3 of my campaign to unhardcode and move gameplay-specific hotkeys to mod code.
This follows on from #13706 and #13711.

This converts all the remaining hotkey consumers except for `WorldCommandWidget` and the hardcoded "dev" hotkeys.  Those two require more drastic changes that will come in their own PRs.

data.title: Clear editor search fields and yield focus on escape.
data.body: Fixes #13964.

data.title: Can't open map editor menu with hotkey after focusing editor search fields
data.body: The search field never gives up focus, so eats the <kbd>esc</kbd> events.

data.title: Sprites not pixel exact - scaling issues
data.body:
Hallo,
the sprites are not pixel exact. Look at the head of the infantry or the trousers of the engineer (compare with other pic). They are broader/wider in x-axis. Some vertical (pixel)lines are duplicated (sprites only - not background). These are scaling bugs that differ from the original game. I'm not talking about general resizing or relative size of the sprites. Its about bad rendering/representation/graphic engine issues.

Is there any fix for this?

Ignore the red circle. I've taken the picture from the [forum](http://www.sleipnirstuff.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=16896).

Click to enlarge. 
![Image](http://abload.de/img/sprite-size-fs8s8ldp.png)

Arch Linux 4.12.8
OpenRA 20170527
Display 1600x1200

data.title: Set up husks and ambient damage for RA fields
data.body: > [21:13] <+pchote> the idea was that they could recieve ambient damage but not be directly targeted themselves

data.title: Fixed no explosions showing on some RA civ structures
data.body:
The combination of HitShape, but not Targetable makes the actors be considered invalid for effect warheads.
Lack of Targetable makes them invulnerable anyway, so removing HitShape and Health (and Explodes) is the most logical fix.

Fixes #13960.

data.title: Missing explosion effects on CTFLAG, ^CivField, and V19.Husk
data.body: Related to #13686 / #13693

data.title: Add support for updating position & linking to actor to SpriteEffect
data.body: This would allow us to use it for things like damaged actor smoke (even TS-style, by adding a WVec to current position every tick).

data.title: Removed a bogus ore mine in a water segment in RA map Opposite Force
data.body: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/756669/29933922-a148477e-8e79-11e7-8051-799a6d7ab346.png)

data.title: Polish RA Jeep and APC muzzle offsets
data.body:
And Jeep turret offset.

The muzzle offsets had zero forward offset, which made the muzzle draw over - instead of in front of - the MG barrel.

Not a blocker for the playtest, but should go into release if possible, since this can't regress anything and adds some polish.

data.title: Fix WithShadow and enable it on airborne TS JumpJet

milestone.title: Tiberian Sun Public Alpha
milestone.description: An incomplete list of blockers for a public alpha release.

data.body:
`WithShadow`'s behaviour when disabled was bogus, making the whole actor invisible.

Fixed that and enabled it on TS JumpJet infantry when airborne.

data.title: Terrain deformation
data.body:
* http://modenc.renegadeprojects.com/Deform
* http://modenc.renegadeprojects.com/DeformThreshhold

Probably a huge feature and I bet there was a good reason this was removed in Red Alert 2.

data.title: Added Tiberium Fiend hiding
data.body: Chose a rather simple way of setting it up.

data.title: CustomTerrainDebugOverlay doesn't render in TS anymore
data.body: I already tried setting the `TextRenderable` zoffset higher, but that didn't help.

data.title: Removed PlayerPaletteFromCurrentTileset
data.body: <s>Use PlayerPaletteFromCurrentTileset for Tiberian Sun rather then two palettes with tileset filters.</s>

data.title: Added map No where to run
data.body: http://resource.openra.net/maps/22645/ Another open map I would consider performance friendly. #12518

data.title: Tweaked TS tiberium colors

milestone.title: Tiberian Sun Public Alpha
milestone.description: An incomplete list of blockers for a public alpha release.

data.body:
- excluded tiberium palettes from global lighting, just like in the original
- tweaked colors to match original more closely

Now looks like this on Sunstroke:
